article.name: How Often Is the Training Content Updated?
article.title: How Often Is the Training Content Updated?
label_names: when do we get new training
article.body:
KnowBe4's comprehensive security awareness training content is updated continuously. We add new content and update our popular content to keep up with cybercrime trends. Legal and compliance content is updated as needed to align with standards and timelines set by regulatory and enforcement agencies. You can use filtering options in the ModStore to view available content based on your subscription level, content type, languages, and more.

You can view the most recent updates to ModStore content in our ModStore Content Releases list.

Back to top

images.alt:
This image displays a content discovery interface featuring advanced filtering options and a content carousel.

**I. Filtering Interface (Top Panel):**

The top section is dedicated to content filtering, organized into two rows plus an expanded 'Additional Filters' section. All dropdowns are initialized to "All" unless otherwise noted.

1.  **Primary Filters:** Contains `Content Types`, `Topics`, and a **Search** text input field with a search icon button.
2.  **Additional Filters (Expanded):** This section contains three columns of controls:
    *   **Column 1:** `Languages`, `Publishers`, and a toggle switch labeled "Hide content already in your library" (currently set to Off).
    *   **Column 2:** `Duration`, and the currently expanded `Subscription Level` dropdown.
    *   **Column 3:** `Targeted Training`, and `Content Features`.
3.  **Content Count:** The link "View All Content (2041)" is displayed, indicating the total number of filtered items.

**II. Active Dropdown Menu (`Subscription Level`):**

The `Subscription Level` dropdown is active, presenting several selection options:

1.  **Quick Filters (Links):** `My Subscriptions` and `All Subscriptions`.
2.  **Checklist Filters:**
    *   `Level 3 | Diamond` (marked with an orange star icon).
    *   `Level 2 | Gold & Platinum`
    *   `Level 1 | Silver`
    *   `Compliance Plus` (marked with an orange star icon).
3.  **Key/Legend:** A highlighted explanatory box at the bottom of the menu states: "This icon indicates your subscriptions."

**III. Content Display (Bottom Section):**

The lower section displays content grouped under the heading **Compliance Plus Essentials**. A horizontal content carousel is indicated by right-aligned navigation buttons (back `<` and forward `>`) above the content cards.
